item.title: Lesson 1 - Come out of the box - The Pioneer School
item.description:
Sign up for all lessons here: http://thelastreformation.com/the-pioneer-school/
Come out of the the box. Much of what we do today is because of our church history. It is important to understand this in order to take our glasses of, which hinder us in reading the Word of God clearly. This is an important lesson as Torben will come back to this again and again during The Pioneer School.
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Ehzw/
Russian (русский) subtitles: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLR0kqLDqIb6ZeCC2kSHN9SOBpiHygApHu

item.title: Lesson 2 - Religion or Jesus - The Pioneer School
item.description:
http://www.TheLastReformation.com Jesus did not come with a new religion. He did not come that we should just go to a certain place (church) at a specific time (Sunday church service) where a certain person (priest) do certain things that we can not do. No, he came with a kingdom that is so much different than what we see in the "church" today. So do you want religion or the kingdom of God which Jesus came with? See this amazing teaching.
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/FbQy/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School
item.itunes:subtitle: Lesson 2 - Religion or Jesus - The Pioneer School

item.title: Lesson 3 - The book of acts - The pioneer school
item.description:
The book of Acts is a little insight into some of the first disciple's life. An insight into a few days in some of the disciples diary. If Jesus is the same today, our diary should also look like what we read there. This challenging lesson will help you to get a life as we read in the book of acts. See more http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/FbRC/

item.title: Lesson 4 - Knowledge or obedience - The Pioneer school
item.description:
Jesus did not come with a lot of theology. He did not start a Bible school. He said: Come and follow me. He called apprentices (disciples), who had to learn through his example ... If we are going to be effective in making disciples, like he calls us, we must then do it the same way as he did. We need to stop teaching so much, which just gives us knowledge, but not much to obey'. See this challenging teaching that will help you to understand what Jesus called us to. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/FbRE/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School

item.title: Lesson 5 - Preach and Heal - Pioneer School
item.description:
Here is an important teaching that reveals how far the churches have come away from the call Jesus gave us. The Bible makes it clear that Jesus paid the price not only so that we can be forgiven of our sins, but also so that people can be healed. Therefore, he called his disciples to both preach the gospel and heal the sick. We who are disciples of Jesus today should therefore also do the same. This will become clear to you in this teaching about healing. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/FbRQ/

item.title: Lesson 6 - Kick-start your Christian life - The Pioneer School
item.description:
www.TheLastReformation.com To be kick-started is to learn to heal the sick. But it's much more than that. It is a tool that can transform people, cities and countries. See this exciting lesson and be kick-started in your Christian life. http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/FbRT/

item.title: Lesson 7 - Repent, and be baptised... - The Pioneer School
item.description:
The gospel is the power of God unto salvation. But satan has deceived us into believing that you should just ask Jesus into your heart and everything is fine. In this important lessons Torben Søndergaard talk about what you must do to be saved and how you must preach the gospel to others. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/FbRV/

item.title: lesson 8 - How to share the gospel - The Pioneer school
item.description:
Torben Søndergaard answer questions from last week's teaching, and shows how he shares the gospel. God has done everything he needed to do. Now it's up to you / them. Repent and be baptized, then you will receive the Holy Spirit. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/FbUP/

item.title: Lesson 9 - Saints or Sinners - The Pioneer School
item.description:
What is repentance? Are we still sinners after we are saved? This challenging lesson will help you to get your religious glasses off and help you to get into the freedom Jesus came with. More on http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi6v/

item.title: Lesson 10 - Be BAPTIZED for the remission of your sins - The Pioneer School
item.description:
Jesus came to save us from our sins and from the slavery of sin. To walk in this freedom we read in the Bible that you need to be baptized. Baptism is more than just a symbol, and Jesus says it is necessary to enter the kingdom of God. This and much more will become clear in this teaching by Torben Søndergaard. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi6w/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School
item.itunes:subtitle: Lesson 10 - Be BAPTIZED for the remission of your sins - The Pioneer School

item.title: Lesson 11 - Baptism with the Holy Spirit - The promise in the New Covenant
item.description:
It is not enough that we "only" have been baptized in water. We also need to be baptized with the Holy Spirit, which is the promise of the new covenant. According to the Bible, there will always be a visible sign when one receive the Holy Spirit. In this lesson, Torben Søndergaard, speaks about this and how you can be baptized and baptize others with the Holy Spirit. An area where there have been many misunderstandings because of our traditions. More on http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi6x/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School

item.title: Lesson 12 - Led by the Holy Spirit - The Pioneer School
item.description:
www.TheLastReformation.com The Holy Spirit was an important part of the early church. It was Him who told them what they should do. It was Him who led them. With Him they experienced the power of God in their lives. You will love this lesson where Torben tells many powerful testimonies about how we today can be led by the Holy Spirit. He also gives practical advice on how you can live the life we read about in the book of Acts. A life led by the Holy Spirit. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi6y/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School

item.title: Lesson 13 - When you fast - The Pioneer School
item.description:
Fasting is a secret that many Christians have forgotten. fasting helps to humble ourselves so that God can lift us up. Fasting breaks walls of fear and disbelief so we can live the life we read about in the books Acts. Listen to this exciting and practical lesson where Torben Søndergaard explain what the Bible says about fasting. He also tells many testimonies from his own life how it is to fast for 3, 20 or 40 days. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi6z/

item.title: Lesson 14 - Is God holy or loving, or both? The Pioneer School
item.description:
Welcome to this important teaching by Torben Søndergaard about God's character. This is a necessary teaching that will provoke many, but at the same time help the church to know God as he really is. More on http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi7A/

item.title: 15. Lesson. New and old covenant - INCREDIBLE
item.description:
CHALLENGING! SHOCKING! IT IS THE TOTAL OPPOSITE OF WHAT WE HAVE BEEN TOLD ... You will be shocked and your eyes will be opened through this great teaching that includes: New and Old Covenant, Grace, Jesus, sins against the Holy Ghost, etc. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi7B/

item.title: 16. Lesson. The New Covenant - Amazing and liberating
item.description:
We are called to live a holy life, but this can not be done by the law, but only by living a new life in the spirit. This is a really important lesson that will set many Christians free from condemnation and show what the new covenant is about. more on http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi7C/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School

http://amara.org/v/Fi7C/

item.title: 17. Lesson. Reformation of the church system - The Pioneer school
item.description:
It's TIME for a reformation of our church system. Buildings, staff, programs and budgets are issues that many people associate with concerning a real church. But the early Christians did not have all of those things in the same way as we have it today. This is an important teaching that will set many people free from this present church system that kills the life, and it will help to become the church Jesus came to build. More on http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi7E/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School

item.title: 18. Lesson. Jesus' vision for the church - The Pioneer School
item.description:
This is an extremely important message to the church today. Here Torben shows us what it really was Jesus has called us to. Yes, much of what we do today in the churches is the exact opposite of what Jesus said. This important message will set many free to serve God in everyday life. - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi7F/

item.title: 19. Lesson. Now is the time to do it - The Pioneer School
item.description:
In this lesson Torben Søndergaard helps us to practically obey Jesus in the calling he has given us. In this video, you get some simple tools that will not only transform your life but many people around you. Let the reformation begin - http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi7H/

item.title: 20. Lesson. The Reformation has begun - The Pioneer School
item.description:
The Reformation has begun, and is growing worldwide. But there are many people around who do not bear fruit, but why? Listen to this last interesting lesson of the Pioneer School with Torben Søndergaard. The Reformation has begun and you can be a part of it! http://www.TheLastReformation.com
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/Fi7I/

item.description:
Torben is back after 2,5 years with some extra lessons. This lesson is about demons and how to cast them out.

item.title: Lesson 22 - Practical lessons on deliverance - The Pioneer School Extra
item.description:
In this lesson, Torben continues what he started to share in lesson 21, but this time it is more practical. You will see different clips of people who are being set free from demons. It's a very strong lesson, in which Torben will also pray for for everybody out there for freedom and deliverance and that God will come and set people free.
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/W27z/

item.title: Lesson 23 - How to understand the Bible - The Pioneer School Extra
item.description:
Listen to this challenging message that will help you to read and understand the Bible in the right way. It also will help you to live the life we read about in the Book of Acts.
Help us caption & translate this video!

item.title: Lesson 24 - Copy/paste Christianity - The Pioneer School Extra
item.description:
In this challenging teaching, Torben speaks about how the Bible has been destroyed by the addition of chapters and verses. Here we look at topics like tongues, tithing, infant baptism, and then one of the most misunderstood verses, Romans 10:9.
This will be provoking, but will allow those religious glasses to come off!
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/1Gy0/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School
item.itunes:subtitle: Lesson 24 - Copy/paste Christianity - The Pioneer School Extra
item.itunes:summary:
In this challenging teaching, Torben speaks about how the Bible has been destroyed by the addition of chapters and verses. Here we look at topics like tongues, tithing, infant baptism, and then one of the most misunderstood verses, Romans 10:9.
This will be provoking, but will allow those religious glasses to come off!
Help us caption & translate this video!
http://amara.org/v/1Gy0/

item.title: Lesson 25 - Family or orphanage - The Pioneer School Extra
item.description:
Now it is time, time to set up new fellowships on a new foundation. We still believe that we need to see a reformation of the church that is already there, but at the same time we feel that now it is time to set up completely new fellowships with new people on a good new foundation. This is the first lesson out of a series, where Torben will speak about church and will help to give a clear picture of how a New Testament church can look like. In this lesson "Family or orphanage" you will see the difference between a family (New Testament church) and an orphanage (the religious institution) and that not one model works for every family. We hope that this teaching will bless you, challenge you, and create a desire in you to see the church as Jesus wants it to be.
Help us caption & translate this video!
https://amara.org/v/gGNF/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School
item.itunes:subtitle: Lesson 25 - Family or orphanage - The Pioneer School Extra

This is the first lesson out of a series, where Torben will speak about church and will help to give a clear picture of how a New Testament church can look like. In this lesson "Family or orphanage" you will see the difference between a family (New Testament church) and an orphanage (the religious institution) and that not one model works for every family. We hope that this teaching will bless you, challenge you, and create a desire in you to see the church as Jesus wants it to be.
Help us caption & translate this video!
https://amara.org/v/gGNF/

item.title: Lesson 26 - Babies, children and fathers - The Pioneer School Extra
item.description:
I am REALLY excited about this new lesson on the online Pioneer school. This is a very important lesson for the WHOLE BODY OF CHRIST.
We need to understand that God is calling us to grow people and not just gather people. TO grow them up from babies to children to fathers in the faith..
This is an important lesson about the different stages people go through in their walk with God. If we want to be effective in making disciples and building fellowships based on the New Testament we need to know this. If you give a beef to a baby it will die. If you give milk to a young man he will maybe live for some time, but he will not grow and he will also end up dead.
The same way we need to know the truth about the spiritual growth I am sharing in this lesson 26 on the online Pioneer school. See it and let God show you where you are and how you can make disciples effective and build fellowships.
See it here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rzBwk_BvMNM
Help us caption & translate this video!
https://amara.org/v/juch/
item.itunes:author: The Last Reformation: The Pioneer School
item.itunes:subtitle: Lesson 26 - Babies, children and fathers - The Pioneer School Extra

I am REALLY excited about this new lesson on the online Pioneer school. This is a very important lesson for the WHOLE BODY OF CHRIST.
We need to understand that God is calling us to grow people and not just gather people. TO grow them up from babies to children to fathers in the faith..
This is an important lesson about the different stages people go through in their walk with God. If we want to be effective in making disciples and building fellowships based on the New Testament we need to know this. If you give a beef to a baby it will die. If you give milk to a young man he will maybe live for some time, but he will not grow and he will also end up dead.
The same way we need to know the truth about the spiritual growth I am sharing in this lesson 26 on the online Pioneer school. See it and let God show you where you are and how you can make disciples effective and build fellowships.
See it here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rzBwk_BvMNM
Help us caption & translate this video!
https://amara.org/v/juch/

item.title: Lesson 27 - Apostolic teams: Winning homes and cities for Jesus - The Pioneer School Extra
item.description:
We are really excited about this lesson where we are talking about the 5-fold ministry Apostle, Prophet, Evangelist, Shepherd and Teacher. We believe this is important to understand if we want to build new testament fellowships I got a strong prophecy many years ago about working in apostolic teams and we will see great things. I really had a longing to see this happening, but I never saw it working in the churches I knew. We didn’t understand it the right way, because we read it like it was a position and not a function. We used the teaching to put people in a box and not to set people free, but now we are starting to see it the right way. I am really excited about this lesson. Hope you will see this. Everyone needs to hear this.
Here is the other video i talked about: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6LIh4Z2CNak
Help us caption & translate this video!
https://amara.org/v/mAg9/

item.title: Lesson 28 - Communion and IN, UP and OUT - Pioneer School Extra.
item.description:
In this lesson we put a lot of what we have learnt together and we look at the importance of communion. Just like baptism in water, communion is not only a symbol but it's so much more then what people think it is.
We also give you a simple "model" of what you can do when you gather with small groups to disciple each other.
See the online Pioneer school here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0gVAb8r3Mj-GbT18XWdro0Kt_6wM0kv_
Help us caption & translate this video!
https://amara.org/v/mM2k/
Help us caption & translate this video!
https://amara.org/v/mWnw/
